price: (28) [Allāh] will say, "Do not dispute before Me, while I had already presented to you the threat [i.e., warning].
arabic: قَالَ لَا تَخۡتَصِمُواْ لَدَيَّ وَقَدۡ قَدَّمۡتُ إِلَيۡكُم بِٱلۡوَعِيدِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qāla lā takhtaṣimū ladayya waqad qaddamtu ilaykum bil-waʿīdi
